entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
